I will promise them a world where men are men again, where women know their place. I will offer them purpose, a sense of belonging, a cause greater than themselves.

We will start small, spreading our message through whispers and coded language, infiltrating the cracks in society. We will build our ranks, recruit the disenfranchised, the angry, the men who feel lost in this feminized world. We will use fear, yes, but also hope. They will come. They will listen. They will follow. And together, we will reshape the world.
